law.catch_line: As provided under § 3-122 of this article, the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene shall notify...
law.text: As provided under § 3-122 of this article, the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene shall notify a victim of a crime of violence or a victim or victim's representative who has filed a notification request form under § 11-104 of this title whenever the Department receives a court order to examine a defendant to determine whether the defendant was criminally responsible for the alleged crime or is competent to stand trial.
